definition: to enumerate sb's shortcomings/to criticize/to scold/to talk on and on
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
number/figure/several/CL:個|个[ge4]
frequently/repeatedly
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: Later, at home, Zilla would accuse him of being a coward and a weakling .
sentences.chinese: 等到了家里，齐拉就数落他是个懦夫，软骨头。

sentences.english: I'm sorry to ride you, pal.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉我又数落你了，伙计。

sentences.english: Tan Xiang scolded Chen Xiang fast, sit to smoke in the office.
sentences.chinese: 谭香的数落让陈响不快，坐在办公室抽烟。

sentences.english: Relatives have scolded him, saying he is irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 亲戚们数落他，骂他是不孝子。

sentences.english: He ranted on about my mistakes in calculations.
sentences.chinese: 他大声数落我的计算错误。

sentences.english: He started to complain about this wicked world.
sentences.chinese: 他开始数落这个罪恶的世界。

sentences.english: The boss really gave me hell today.
sentences.chinese: 老板今天著实数落了我一通。

sentences.english: Third, we need to and li jia small blood to the bitter end, guess gu will jia a three grumble.
sentences.chinese: 贾三要和李小手血拼到底，猜猜姑将贾三数落一番。

sentences.english: Li Kui also reprove a pass, which made Big Brother look like.
sentences.chinese: 同时还数落了李逵一通，哪像个作大哥的样子。

sentences.english: No, the boss shot me down in the interview.
sentences.chinese: 没有，那老板在面试时不留余地数落我。

sentences.english: ChangJiang a listen to grumble up SongJuan now cant do this.
sentences.chinese: 常江一听就数落起了宋娟现在不能这么做。

sentences.english: B:No, the boss shot me down in the interview.
sentences.chinese: 没有，那老板在面试的时候不留余地数落我。

sentences.english: I hear people who have sold blood to face relentless chatter.
sentences.chinese: 一听到病友曾经卖过血，毫不留情面的进行数落。

sentences.english: Mrs. John remarked negatively about the actors and actresses.
sentences.chinese: 约翰夫人把男女演员数落了一番。

sentences.english: He angrily scolded JiYaSha, said she wanted to see your jokes.
sentences.chinese: 他生气地数落吉雅莎，说她想看自己的笑话。

sentences.english: She left me and went on into the house with sharp words for my father.
sentences.chinese: 她离开我，一边大声数落着父亲一边向屋里走去。
